game.l_dis:
Riddle Transfer 2 – Defeat the Alien Quiz

Riddle Transfer 2 is the concluding point-and-click adventure in the Riddle School series. Players guide Phil Eggtree and his friends through Riddle Elementary and an alien ship, solving puzzles, exposing Quiz’s plan, and escaping safely.

What is Riddle Transfer 2?

This final installment follows Phil and friends as they are chased by alien guards, hide in a sewer room, and find a portal to Riddle Elementary. Players solve puzzles, uncover Quiz’s experiments, and ultimately escape the alien ship after Diz intervenes.

How to Play Riddle Transfer 2?

  • Point-and-Click: Click on objects and characters to explore rooms and interact with the environment.
  • Collect and Use Items: Solve puzzles by collecting and combining items creatively.
  • Defeat Quiz: Expose Quiz’s plans and solve the challenges he sets.
  • Explore Riddle Elementary: Navigate classrooms, corridors, and hidden areas to progress.
  • Escape the Ship: Complete objectives and puzzles to leave the alien ship safely after Diz’s intervention.

Why Play Riddle Transfer 2 Unblocked?

Experience the epic conclusion of the Riddle School series online without restrictions, with challenging puzzles, clever storylines, and the series’ signature humor.

Key Features

  • Final Adventure: The last game in the Riddle School series with a complete story arc.
  • Puzzle Solving: Solve challenging point-and-click puzzles to progress.
  • Alien and School Environments: Explore Riddle Elementary and alien facilities.
  • Story Continuation: Defeat the alien Quiz and protect Diz’s throne.
  • Unblocked Online: Play anywhere directly in your browser.

Can You Escape?

Guide Phil and friends in Riddle Transfer 2 to solve puzzles, thwart Quiz’s experiments, and escape the alien ship safely!
